subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski received a huge push from his teammate Kyle Busch to take the lead with a lap to go, then used a calculated move to prevent Busch from taking the win away Sunday at Talladega.
snippet: Brad Keselowski received a huge push from his teammate Kyle Busch to take the lead with a lap to go, then used a calculated move to prevent Busch from taking the win away Sunday at Talladega.
